meanings.sent1: My sibling and I like to play together.
meanings.sent2: I have one sibling, a younger sister.
meanings.sent3: My sibling always steals my snacks!
meanings.sent4: Having a sibling is like having a built-in best friend.
meanings.sent5: Growing up with a sibling means never being alone.

meanings.definition: One of two or more individuals having one common parent.
meanings.sent1: She is my sibling because we share the same mom.
meanings.sent2: I have three siblings, two brothers and a sister.
meanings.sent3: Our parents always mix up our names because we look like siblings.
meanings.sent4: In a big family, being a sibling means always having someone to talk to.
meanings.sent5: Being a sibling means sharing not just genes, but also memories and love.
